course_title: Special Topics: Political Science: Creating Civic&CommunityChange
class_notes:
Course title: Creating Civic and Community Change


Course will be taught by Hannah Joy Gebresilassie from the Center for Civic and Community Engagement.


In this three-credit course, students will have the opportunity to explore intersections of civic and community engagement in everyday life and explore ways they can cultivate change in their communities. Through experiential learning, students will gain insights into various government structures and diverse pathways creating impact, while learning how to turn theoretical knowledge into real-world action. This course includes educational field trips, interactions engaging with dynamic guest speakers and the creation of action plans aimed at supporting meaningful causes.
course_description: Selected topics and problems in political science. Content will vary in successive offerings of this course. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
